<<Grid Background="Black"> <Grid.ColumnDefinitions> <ColumnDefinition Width="*" /> <ColumnDefinition Width="2.5*" /> </Grid.ColumnDefinitions> <ScrollViewer Grid.Column="0" VerticalScrollBarVisibility="Hidden"> <StackPanel Image.MouseDown="ImageClicked" x:Name="imagesPanel"> <Image Source="D:/1.jpg" HorizontalAlignment="Center" Width="350px" x:Name="Image1"/> <Image Source="D:/2.jpg" HorizontalAlignment="Center" Width="350px" x:Name="Image2"/> <Image Source="D:/3.jpg" HorizontalAlignment="Center" Width="350px" x:Name="Image3"/> </StackPanel> </ScrollViewer>
<Grid Grid.Column="1"> <Grid.RowDefinitions> <RowDefinition Height="3*"/> <RowDefinition Height="*"/> </Grid.RowDefinitions> <Image Grid.Row="0" x:Name="MainImage" Source="D:/3.jpg"/>
<StackPanel Grid.Row="1"> <Label Content="Размер файла в пикселях: " Foreground="Azure" FontFamily="OpenSans" x:Name="sizeOfImage"></Label> <Label Content="Разрешение файла: " Foreground="Azure" FontFamily="OpenSans" x:Name="resolutionOfImage"></Label> <Label Content="Код текущего пикселя: " Foreground="Azure" FontFamily="OpenSans" x:Name="currentPixel"></Label> <Label Content="Различных цветов в картинке: " Foreground="Azure" FontFamily="OpenSans" x:Name="colorsCount"></Label> <Button x:Name="addPictures" Content="Добавить изображения" Click="AddPictures" Foreground="Azure" Background="DimGray" Width="150px" HorizontalAlignment="Left"></Button> </StackPanel> </Grid>
</Grid>.../>
